entree.desc: Toasted Tuscan bread with sun-ripened beef tomatoes.
Crispy green leaves, pancetta and croutons tossed in our homemade dressing topped with fresh parmesan. roasted.
Selection of cured meats, Italian cheese, sun-dried tomatoes with pickled home-grown vegetables.Served with our homemade bread.
Fresh pan-fried calamari,fresh garlic lightly tossed in herbs.
Meatballs marinated to a traditional Tuscan recipe, served in our authenic tomato sauce with mozzarella cheese served with garlic bread. roasted.
Seared fillet of Sea bass with lemon mash and roast vegetable ratatouille
Baked trout with almonds in Italian style salsa served with grilled baby potatoes and courgettes.
Irish salmon,tomato,capers,chilli,olives and pepperoni pincante with baby potatoes.
Prime 10oz Irish grilled sirloin steak with creamed brandy peppercorn sauce or garlic herb butter.
Prime 10oz Irish grilled Sirloin Steak served with creamed brandy peppercorn sauce or garlic herb butter.
Charcoal grilled 8oz of fillet steak, served with creamed brandy peppercorn sauce or garlic herb butter.
Free-range Irish chicken fillet marinated in fresh lemon and herbs, cooked over a charcoal grill.(LF)
Free-range Irish chicken fillet cooked delightfully in a field mushroom sauce.
Chicken supreme with spinach, three cheeses, wrapped in Parmaham, white wine and mustard cream.
Mozzarella cheese. (V)
Spinach, egg, black olives and garlic.(V)
Folded and filled with ham, mushrooms, onions.
Avocado, reduced fat mozzarella, sun dried tomatoes, rocket salad and basil leaves. (LF)
Jalapeno peppers, chorizo and fresh Parmesan.
A traditional homemade “pick me up” biscuit in coffee liqueur with mascarpone cream. Exelente!
Homemade apple and berry crumble oven baked with cinnamon,topped with crunchy oat crumble served warm with fresh cream or vanilla ice cream.
Exceedingly tasty double chocolate fudge cake served warm with fresh cream or vanilla ice cream. Perfect for all chocolate lovers.
Choux pastry filled with fresh cream and smothered in chocolate sauce.
Selection of our finest Italian cheeses.
